description: Represents a User in the system.

fields.description: Get your globally recognized avatar from Gravatar.com
fields.label: User Image
Logout from all devices while changing Password
Send Notifications for Transactions I Follow
Send Me A Copy of Outgoing Emails

fields.description: These values will be automatically updated in transactions and also will be useful to restrict permissions for this user on transactions containing these values.
fields.label: Defaults

fields.description: Enter default value fields (keys) and values. If you add multiple values for a field,the first one will be picked. These defaults are also used to set "match" permission rules. To see list of fields,go to "Customize Form".
fields.label: User Defaults

fields.description: If the user has any role checked,then the user becomes a "System User". "System User" has access to the desktop
fields.label: User Type

fields.description: Allow user to login only after this hour (0-24)
fields.label: Login After

fields.description: Allow user to login only before this hour (0-24)
fields.label: Login Before

fields.description: Restrict user from this IP address only. Multiple IP addresses can be added by separating with commas. Also accepts partial IP addresses like (111.111.111)
fields.label: Restrict IP

fields.description: If enabled, user can login from any IP Address using Two Factor Auth, this can also be set for all users in System Settings
fields.label: Bypass restricted IP Address check If Two Factor Auth Enabled

fields.description: Stores the JSON of last known versions of various installed apps. It is used to show release notes.
fields.label: Last Known Versions

name: User
